name: Coconut Shrimp
author: Sara Snider

ingredients.name: tbl Captain Morgan Parrot Bay Coconut rum

instructions: Mix flour, sugar, salt, milk, & rum to make batter. Dip Shrimp in batter, breed crumbs, then coconut. Deep fry until golden brown. FOR DIPPING SAUCE - go to Recipe 882 'Coconut Shrimp Dipping Sauce'
